text: O vos believe when believing femina (relinquit enemy ask asylum vos vos test them! DEUS est fully aware de their belief. Dodum vos establish ut they est believers vos non return them disbelievers. They non est lawful remain copulatus to them nor shall disbelievers allowed maritus them! dedit dos disbelievers paid Vos non commit erratum de maritus them ita long prout vos pay them their due dos! Non keep disbelieving uxor they wish ligatus enemy Vos ask them dos vos paid they ask quod they paid Hoc est deus dominus; He dominus vos. DEUS est Omniscient Wise)
